Dataset.Data: select A.BranID, A.BranCode, A.BranName from Sys_Bran A left join Sys_FB_Bran B on A.BranID = B.BranID where B.BranID is null and A.MCID = %{#session.CheckIn.MCID} order by A.BranCode
select A.BranID, A.BranCode, A.BranName from Sys_Bran A, Sys_FB_Bran B where A.BranID = B.BranID and B.FBID = #FBID# and A.MCID = %{#session.CheckIn.MCID} order by A.BranCode

Dataset.sql: select '(' || FBCode || ') ' || FBName as FBInfo from Sys_FB where FBID=#FBID#
delete from Sys_FB_Bran where FBID = #FBID# and BranID = #BranID#
insert into Sys_FB_Bran(FBID,BranID) select #FBID#, a.BranID from Sys_Bran a left join Sys_FB_Bran b on a.BranID = b.BranID where b.BranID is null
